channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Why Apu?
channel.desc: Embark on an awe-inspiring journey into the heart of Rauk?mara, a forest teetering on the edge of ecological disaster.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ngau Tuar?
channel.desc: Bumper Cars, Big Snappers, and Sore Losers ? Wasi Thomas, Rahera Hoterene, and Nikora Wharerau go head-to-head. On the water, someone lands a 20lb snapper. Wasi, and Chris face off in a game of table tennis. The Tipene boys share stories behind their nicknames. Tipene, Wasi, and Thomas hit the bowling alley.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Pukunati Lose Weight Or Die
channel.desc: Roihana's mental health is fraying. With a visa crisis looming, time is running out.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Taki Rua Theatre
channel.desc: What began as a partnership experiment in biculturalism between M?ori and P?keh? grew into Taki Rua Theatre, the unofficial national M?ori theatre company.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: Music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. Includes old music videos updated with graphic factoids.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Iconic archival series documenting the unique stories and histories of M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakaata M?ori
channel.desc: Whakaata M?ori specialises in the stories of Aotearoa. Be entertained and informed with news, current affairs, sports, drama, documentaries and much more.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kori Club
channel.desc: Kori Club is a captivating series for 0-8-year-olds that marries the charm of "The Wiggles" with the magic of Te Ao M?ori. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?hura
channel.desc: Niua and Hura travel to Te Rotorua-nui-a-Kahumatamomoe to uncover the origins of thermal energy and how it was brought from Hawaiki to Aotearoa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: T?karo Tribe
channel.desc: Ta?karo Tribe is an animated series for 0-6 year olds. We follow our cute characters as they enter the magical Alphabet Forest where our talking Papa Rakau and Talking Pond Koka? live. (R).

channel.title: Darwin and Newts
channel.desc: An animated series for youngsters who love to figure out how things work. (R).

channel.title: Island of Mystery
channel.desc: With the maero no longer a threat, Kura invites Ruiha to join them on the journey up the maunga to find the godstick and hopefully Rangi too. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tipua
channel.desc: A series of unnerving experiences has ?repa starting to believe her friends are right - she is doing too much. Nothing is stacking up and she has no real answers.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tipua
channel.desc: ?repa is still convinced someone is following her but lets her friends distract her from her worries with a party. Everything seems to go well until an uninvited guest makes an eerie appearance.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ata Toi + Wai
channel.desc: Join presenters Te Aumihi Hohepa and Tawhanga Rika as they celebrate the world of M?ori art. Actor Aniwa Whaiapuchats about their acting mahi and passions for makeup and kapa haka. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: M? Te Atea
channel.desc: Way-finder, Captain and name-finder, Mahara Nicholas explains to us the important duty of naming his ir?mutu and how he came about his ingoa whilst journeying on Ng?hiraka mai Tawhiti. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Amplify
channel.desc: Inuk sensation Beatrice Deer takes a deep dive into the history of Inuit residential schools to craft an arresting new song in tribute to the lost children in unmarked graves. Directed by asinnajaq. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ngau Tuar?
channel.desc: Speed, Smack Talk & Smelly Surprises ? The boys visit Drift Kartz Rotorua, where it?s all about speed, cheek and who can take the corners. The koroua are put to the test ? it?s juicier and smellier than it sounds. In Ruatoki, the ?Mau R?kau Club? show us their moves. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Whakanuia
channel.desc: A celebration of our finest people. Fun for all the whanau as we honour the life and times of our M?ori icons in a live studio special. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Mauri Reo Mauri Ora Wharekura
channel.desc: Mauri Reo, Mauri Ora is a series of programme content that focus on entertaining and educating Wharekura. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Wairua (Te Reo)
channel.desc: What is wairua? Answered from a M?ori perspective. Explanations about the wairua of human beings and the wairua contained in all living things everywhere. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Waka Huia is an iconic archival series recording the unique stories and histories of Maori for all New Zealanders. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Fresh 2025
channel.desc: Our favourite flavours of the Pacific are presented in a Fresh Poly-platter in this series dedicated to inspiring Islanders worldwide. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka To Worlds
channel.desc: Following the lives of the New Zealand Waka Ama Elite Junior Men and Women's teams as they train their hearts out in the quest for gold at the 2022 IVF World Sprint Championships. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Kapa Haka o Te Wh?nau-a-Apanui
channel.desc: Featuring Te Kapa Haka o Te Wh?nau-a-Apanui, Whakaata M?ori presents Te Matatini o Te K?hui Maunga - the ultimate celebration of haka excellence. This is haka at its finest.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Only In Aotearoa
channel.desc: Short, sharp comedy skits from a distinctly M?ori perspective. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rule of Mum
channel.desc: When a loveable man-child is brutally dumped, he decides it's time to take charge of his own life, but the must first overcome the biggest obstacle standing in his way: his M?m?. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kair?kau
channel.desc: An unwelcome stranger crosses a tribal boundary forcing Ng?ti Rangitihi Chief Tionga to react with caution to a possible alliance between bordering tribes. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: A serial drama thats all about drama. Following a group of city based rangatahi as they navigate life. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Ahik?roa
channel.desc: A serial drama thats all about drama. Following a group of city based rangatahi as they navigate life. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Rewind
channel.desc: Music video series with curated NZ and Reo M?ori music. Includes old music videos updated with graphic factoids. (R).
